Manual Holder ResponsibilityÂ¶

Each authorized holder of a Quality Assurance Manual or parts thereof is personally responsible that their copy is properly amended and/or revised. This is to be documented by filling in the revision record which is part of each copy. Each manual holder may be subject to scheduled audits or unscheduled inspections to verify that their copy of the QM is up-to-date. Non-conformities shall be reported to the Head of Quality.
